description: This file defines a RealtimeService class for real-time attendance updates via Server-Sent Events (SSE). It manages SSE connections, processes incoming JSON data streams, and provides an interface for connecting, disconnecting, and listening to events.

classes.name: RealtimeService
classes.description: A service class that manages SSE connections to receive real-time attendance updates and broadcasts parsed JSON events via a stream.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Establishes an SSE connection to a specified URI, setting up stream listeners for incoming data, if enabled via environment variable.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.description: Cancels the ongoing SSE stream subscription, effectively disconnecting from the SSE endpoint.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Cleans up resources by disconnecting and closing stream controllers and HTTP clients.
